description.zh-cn: 由女真族首领努尔哈赤于1616年建立的政权，为清朝的前身。
description.en: A khanate established by the Jurchen leader Nurhaci in 1616, the predecessor to the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 后金的创建者，统一了女真各部，为清朝的建立奠定了基础。
description.en: Founder of the Later Jin, who unified the Jurchen tribes and laid the foundation for the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤第八子，后金第二位汗，后改国号为大清并称帝。
description.en: The eighth son of Nurhaci, the second khan of the Later Jin, who later renamed the state to Great Qing and proclaimed himself emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个王朝，是后金的主要敌对政权。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history and the main adversary of the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 由后金发展而来的中国最后一个封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, which evolved from the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 居住在中国东北地区的民族，后被皇太极改名为满洲。
description.en: An ethnic group residing in Northeast China, later renamed Manchu by Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 由女真族发展而来的民族，名称由皇太极确定。
description.en: An ethnic group that evolved from the Jurchens, with its name finalized by Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤创建的军政合一、兵民合一的社会组织形式。
description.en: A system of military and social organization created by Nurhaci, integrating civil and military functions.

description.zh-cn: 后金的第一个都城，位于今辽宁省新宾满族自治县。
description.en: The first capital of the Later Jin, located in modern-day Xinbin Manchu Autonomous County, Liaoning.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤于1618年发布的讨明檄文，标志着对明朝的公开反叛。
description.en: A manifesto issued by Nurhaci in 1618, declaring war against the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 后金与明朝之间的关键战役，后金以少胜多，改变了辽东的战略格局。
description.en: A key battle between the Later Jin and the Ming dynasty, where the outnumbered Jin forces won a decisive victory, altering the strategic landscape of Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领袁崇焕在宁远城击败努尔哈赤的战役，是努尔哈赤首次遭受重大军事挫败。
description.en: A battle where the Ming general Yuan Chonghuan defeated Nurhaci at the city of Ningyuan, marking Nurhaci's first major military defeat.

description.zh-cn: 明朝末年将领，在宁远战役中击败努尔哈赤。
description.en: A general of the late Ming dynasty who defeated Nurhaci in the Battle of Ningyuan.

description.zh-cn: 位于蒙古高原南部的蒙古部落群体，后被皇太极征服。
description.en: A group of Mongol tribes in the southern part of the Mongolian Plateau, later conquered by Hong Taiji.

death_place.zh-cn: 甘肃省天祝藏族自治县

description.zh-cn: 蒙古察哈尔部大汗，在与后金的战争中失败，最终病逝。
description.en: The Great Khan of the Chahar Mongols, who was defeated in the war against the Later Jin and eventually died of illness.

en: Later Jin conquest of the Chahar

description.zh-cn: 皇太极领导的一系列军事行动，最终征服了林丹汗的察哈尔部，统一了漠南蒙古。
description.en: A series of military campaigns led by Hong Taiji that resulted in the conquest of Ligdan Khan's Chahar tribe and the unification of Southern Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛的王朝，最初亲明，后在丁卯战争中被迫与后金结盟。
description.en: A Korean dynasty that was initially pro-Ming but was forced into an alliance with the Later Jin after the First Manchu invasion of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极发动的对朝鲜的第一次入侵，迫使朝鲜断绝与明朝的关系并与后金结为兄弟之盟。
description.en: The first invasion of Korea launched by Hong Taiji, which forced Korea to sever ties with the Ming and enter into a fraternal alliance with the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤的父亲，在明军的一次攻击中与父亲觉昌安一同被杀。
description.en: Father of Nurhaci, killed along with his father Giocangga during an attack by Ming forces.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤的祖父，在明军的一次攻击中与儿子塔克世一同被杀。
description.en: Grandfather of Nurhaci, killed along with his son Taksi during an attack by Ming forces.

description.zh-cn: 林丹汗之子，于1635年向后金投降。
description.en: Son of Ligdan Khan, who surrendered to the Later Jin in 1635.

description.zh-cn: 基于蒙古文字创制的文字，于1599年由努尔哈赤下令创制。
description.en: A script based on the Mongolian alphabet, created under the order of Nurhaci in 1599.

description.zh-cn: 后金学者，奉努尔哈赤之命创制满文。
description.en: A Later Jin scholar who was ordered by Nurhaci to create the Manchu script.

description.zh-cn: 后金学者，奉努尔哈赤之命创制满文。
description.en: A Later Jin scholar who was ordered by Nurhaci to create the Manchu script.

description.zh-cn: 原明朝将领，于1633年率部投降后金，为后金带来了先进的火炮技术。
description.en: A former Ming general who defected to the Later Jin in 1633, bringing advanced artillery technology with him.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤在赫图阿拉称汗，建立后金政权。
description.en: Nurhaci proclaimed himself Khan in Hetu Ala, establishing the Later Jin regime.

description.zh-cn: 后金自努尔哈赤发布“七大恨”起，便与明朝进入长期的战争状态。
description.en: Starting from Nurhaci's issuance of the 'Seven Grievances', the Later Jin entered a state of prolonged warfare with the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 后金是清朝的前身，1636年皇太极改国号为大清。
description.en: The Later Jin was the predecessor of the Qing dynasty; Hong Taiji renamed the state to Great Qing in 1636.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极在盛京称帝，改国号为“大清”，建立了清朝。
description.en: Hong Taiji proclaimed himself emperor in Shengjing, changed the state's name to 'Great Qing', and established the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极是努尔哈赤的第八子。
description.en: Hong Taiji was the eighth son of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极继努尔哈赤之后成为后金的第二位，也是最后一位汗。
description.en: Hong Taiji succeeded Nurhaci as the second and last khan of the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤是后金的开国君主。
description.en: Nurhaci was the founding monarch of the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤公布“七大恨”，以此为由起兵反明，标志着后金与明朝的战争正式开始。
description.en: Nurhaci announced the 'Seven Grievances' as the reason for rebelling against the Ming, marking the official start of the war between the Later Jin and the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 萨尔浒之战是明朝对后金的一次重大军事失败，改变了辽东的战略格局。
description.en: The Battle of Sarhu was a major military defeat for the Ming dynasty against the Later Jin, which altered the strategic landscape of Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤在宁远战役中被袁崇焕击败，这是他军事生涯中的首次大败，并可能因此役受伤而于数月后去世。
description.en: Nurhaci was defeated by Yuan Chonghuan in the Battle of Ningyuan, his first major defeat, and he may have died several months later from injuries sustained in this battle.

description.zh-cn: 在宁远战役中，明朝将领袁崇焕成功抵御了努尔哈赤的进攻，并可能使其负伤。
description.en: During the Battle of Ningyuan, Ming general Yuan Chonghuan successfully defended against Nurhaci's attack and possibly wounded him.

description.zh-cn: 在后金的军事征讨下，林丹汗被迫西逃，最终病逝于甘肃。
description.en: Under the military campaign of the Later Jin, Ligdan Khan was forced to flee west and eventually died of illness in Gansu.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极通过一系列军事和政治手段，最终征服了漠南蒙古各部。
description.en: Through a series of military and political maneuvers, Hong Taiji eventually conquered the tribes of Southern Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 丁卯战争后，朝鲜王朝被迫与后金缔结不平等的“兄弟之盟”，成为其半臣属国。
description.en: After the Dingmao War, the Joseon dynasty was forced to conclude the unequal 'Brotherly Alliance' with the Later Jin, becoming its semi-vassal state.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极下令废除“女真”旧称，定族名为“满洲”。
description.en: Hong Taiji ordered the abolition of the old name 'Jurchen' and designated the ethnic name as 'Manchu'.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤在1615年创建了八旗制度，作为其政权的军事和社会基础。
description.en: In 1615, Nurhaci created the Eight Banners system as the military and social foundation of his regime.

description.zh-cn: 塔克世是觉昌安的儿子。
description.en: Taksi was the son of Giocangga.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤是塔克世的儿子。
description.en: Nurhaci was the son of Taksi.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤的父亲塔克世在涉及明军的混战中被杀害，这是努尔哈赤反明的原因之一。
description.en: Nurhaci's father, Taksi, was killed in a melee involving Ming forces, which became one of Nurhaci's reasons for rebelling against the Ming.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤的祖父觉昌安在涉及明军的混战中被杀害，这是努尔哈赤反明的原因之一。
description.en: Nurhaci's grandfather, Giocangga, was killed in a melee involving Ming forces, which became one of Nurhaci's reasons for rebelling against the Ming.

description.zh-cn: 额哲是林丹汗的儿子。
description.en: Ejei was the son of Ligdan Khan.

description.zh-cn: 林丹汗之子额哲率部向皇太极投降。
description.en: Ejei, son of Ligdan Khan, surrendered with his followers to Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤下令学者额尔德尼和噶盖以蒙古文字为基础创制满文。
description.en: Nurhaci ordered the scholars Erdeni and Gagai to create the Manchu script based on the Mongolian alphabet.

description.zh-cn: 额尔德尼奉努尔哈赤之命创制满文。
description.en: Erdeni created the Manchu script under Nurhaci's order.

description.zh-cn: 噶盖奉努尔哈赤之命创制满文。
description.en: Gagai created the Manchu script under Nurhaci's order.

description.zh-cn: 原明朝将领孔有德于1633年率部投降皇太极。
description.en: The former Ming general Kong Youde defected with his troops to Hong Taiji in 1633.
